resources.string: Confused about temperature conversion? Dont worry, this app is ready to help you!. All you have to do is enter the temperature, select the starting unit and the conversion destination, and then calculate it. Come on, try it now!

Temperature conversion is the process of changing the temperature from a single scale to other scales. Three commonly used temperature scales: 

1. Celsius (°C) – Temperature scale most common in the world, including Indonesia.

2. Fahrenheit (°F) – Used in The United States and several other countries such as Belize and the Bahamas.

 3. Kelvin (K) – International temperature scale used in science.
Convert Temperature %1$s %2$s to %3$s the result is %4$s
